tweet: Due to recent changes in my life, I decided to take a sabbatical leave, outside of crypto. That includes Videos on Youtube. I don't know how long, but I need my time.  I'm convinced #IOTA will continue their successful journey until I'm back. Thanks for all the support!

The value of #IOTA will be measured by the applications that will use this technology in the future. In 2018, the IOTA Foundation has taken a lot of steps so that in the future the possibilities for a real use will exist. The year 2019 will be very important.

Technology can change the world for the better, but only if people of good will work together to make sure it’s designed & deployed in ways that protect & benefit everyone. That’s why #IOTA chose to entrust the stewardship of its #DLT to a non-profit foundation.  https://t.co/FYXs039aHJ
